updates.content: Metrofibre Engineers are reprovisioning affected clients to restore services. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the outage.
Metrofibre are conducting emergency maintenance to resolve the outage as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.
